Package com.pecs.pecsi

Class Administration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pecs.pecsi.Administration
  • public class Administration
extends Object
    Policy Administration component (PAP)

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      private String LIST_PATH

      Path of the XSD schema of the XACML 3.0 standard

        public Administration()

    • Method Detail

      • isFirstPolicy

        private boolean isFirstPolicy()
        Check if we are adding the first privacy policy in the system
        Returns:
        true if is the first policy, false otherwise

      • addFirstPolicy

        private void addFirstPolicy​(Preferences prefs,
                            String path)
        Method used privately to manage the enforcement of the first privacy policy in the system
        Parameters:
        prefs - Preferences mapped object containing user preferences (see Preferences class)
        path - JSON path of the raw user preferences (ideally provided by a frontend application)

      • addPolicy

        public void addPolicy​(Preferences prefs,
                      String path)
        Main component of the Administration component. It generates, validates and enforces the new privacy policy in the system
        Parameters:
        prefs - Preferences mapped object containing user preferences (see Preferences class)
        path - JSON path of the raw user preferences (ideally provided by a frontend application)

      • getEnforcedPolicy

        public Preferences getEnforcedPolicy()
        Get the enforced privacy policy in the system, if there is one
        Returns:
        The Preferences object representing the enforced policy. Returns null if no privacy policy is enforced at the moment of method invocation

      • savePolicy

        private static void savePolicy​(String policy,
                               String path)
                        throws IOException
        Save the privacy policy file
        Parameters:
        policy - XML representation of the generated privacy policy
        path - Path where to save the policy file
        Throws:
        IOException - If some problems occur while writing the file

      • saveJson

        private static void saveJson​(String path,
                             String uuid)
                      throws IOException
        Save the JSON representation of the privacy policy
        Parameters:
        path - JSON path coming from frontend side
        uuid - Generated UUIDv4 assigned to the policy
        Throws:
        IOException - If some problems occur while writing the file
